channel.title: Getting my server online so others can play?
channel.description: Hey so i have made my server. i have my own client and source thingy. I also have a np-ip.org address, and i portfarwarded. what do i do now? like how do people start playing my game with me?

item.source: Getting my server online so others can play?

item.title: Getting my server online so others can play?
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

[quote=“Trent!!, post:9, topic:327538”]ah well.

when people download run your client,
it should be configured to connect to your server which is either hosted direct from your computer
or through a vps.

hide all the files in your client folder.
here is how to if you dont know.
ctrl + click all the files you want to hide.
then right click and go to properties.
then under attributes, click hidden, then apply the new properties and click ok.
FYI:Hidding your files doesnt do much they can show hidden files and see them so i recommend taking the java files out people arent that dumb that they cant unhide files fyi.
then to compress the file
ensure that you have winrar on you computer, and make sure it’s fully operational,
then simply right click your client folder
and select add to archive

if you need more help
pm me :)[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Getting my server online so others can play?

item.title: Getting my server online so others can play?
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

ah well.

when people download run your client,
it should be configured to connect to your server which is either hosted direct from your computer
or through a vps.

hide all the files in your client folder.
here is how to if you dont know.
ctrl + click all the files you want to hide.
then right click and go to properties.
then under attributes, click hidden, then apply the new properties and click ok.

then to compress the file
ensure that you have winrar on you computer, and make sure it’s fully operational,
then simply right click your client folder
and select add to archive

if you need more help
pm me

Read full topic
item.source: Getting my server online so others can play?

item.title: Getting my server online so others can play?
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

[quote=“Trent!!, post:7, topic:327538”]when you put it on server status page, it asks you for your ip and your port.

you may want to put it in your server description if you wish.
and you may put a download link for your CLIENT there also, making sure it has been archived/compressed.

anything else?[/quote]

Actually ya!
sorry, i feel so stupid, new to this lol.
So i have right now, two separate folders. One which is my client, and the other is my source. How do i compress them, or make it so i only have to click one “run” button and both my client and source opens at the same time?

Read full topic
item.source: Getting my server online so others can play?

item.title: Getting my server online so others can play?
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

when you put it on server status page, it asks you for your ip and your port.

you may want to put it in your server description if you wish.
and you may put a download link for your CLIENT there also, making sure it has been archived/compressed.

anything else?

Read full topic

post your server on server status page[/quote]

OK, so i don’t need to tell everyone my ip or do i?
or do they just download my server or something like that?

[quote=“tman915, post:3, topic:327538”][quote author=Unknowned Java? link=topic=423926.msg3113474#msg3113474 date=1264737711]
First, give your friend your server ip & also have your friend test it out for you see if he could connect or not.
[/quote]
ok but what if i want a random person that i don’t know to play it?[/quote]Do what Unknowned said. If your friend can connect strangers can.
